best_subtitle: A selection of our best categories
best_courses_subtitle: A selection of our best courses
course_1_desc: This course is for beginners who want to learn programming from scratch. You'll study Python syntax, variables, loops, and functions. With practical tasks.
course_2_desc: Advanced Python course: generators, decorators, working with files and OOP. Ideal for those who have completed the basics and want to grow.
course_3_desc: Learn to build modern web applications with React. We'll cover components, hooks, routing, and how to set up your project from scratch.
course_4_desc: A web layout course: weâ€™ll study HTML, CSS, flexbox, and responsive design. Perfect for those starting out in web development.
course_5_desc: Get acquainted with machine learning: linear regression, classification, and basic algorithms. All in Python with practice.
course_6_desc: Deep learning: layers, training, overfitting. Build your own neural network from scratch using TensorFlow or PyTorch.
course_7_desc: Databases: SELECT, INSERT, JOIN, GROUP BY. You'll learn to write queries and analyze data.
course_8_desc: Design databases correctly: normalization, keys, indexes, and relationships. Lots of practice and real-world cases.
course_9_desc: Basic English course: grammar, reading, conversation. Suitable for complete beginners.
course_10_desc: Learn English in IT context: terms, phrases in meetings, messaging, and documentation. For developers and testers.
course_11_desc: Algorithmic thinking and logic. A great start before learning any programming language.
course_12_desc: Dive into object-oriented programming with Java. Classes, inheritance, encapsulation, and polymorphism.
course_13_desc: Online security: passwords, phishing, brute force, data protection. An easy start for future security specialists.
course_14_desc: Learn to test websites and networks for vulnerabilities. Only ethical methods and real practice.
course_15_desc: A course on DevOps: automation, CI/CD, working with Git and servers. Theory and practice in one.
course_16_desc: App containerization with Docker and cluster management using Kubernetes. Suitable for mid-level and senior devs.
course_17_desc: Build mobile apps for Android and iOS using Flutter. Learn Dart and how to use widgets.
course_18_desc: Android development fundamentals: activities, XML, Gradle, emulator setup. Beginner-friendly.
course_19_desc: Improve your communication, teamwork, and self-presentation. Soft skills are a key part of your career.
course_20_desc: How to write a resume and pass an interview in an IT company. Tons of insights from HR professionals.

about_text: SkillWay is a modern educational platform that brings together courses, tools, and opportunities for learning and career growth. We aim to make high-quality education accessible to everyone.
contact_success: Thank you! We'll get back to you soon.
about_paragraph_1: SkillWay is a platform that connects students and instructors for online learning.
about_paragraph_2: We offer a wide range of courses across various domains such as development, design, and more.
about_paragraph_3: Our mission is to make quality education accessible to everyone.
education_intro: Choose your path and gain real-world skills to build your career.
